title: Get Ready, Travel Info Guide
text: Front end webpage that gathers information about a location for a user to help prepare for their travel.

title: Weather App
text: Weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

title: Team Directory
text: Command Line Application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Boostrap Portfolio
text: Portfolio built using Bootstrap CSS Framework.

title: Work Day Scheduler
text: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Coding Quizz
text: A combination of multiple-choice questions and interactive coding Challenges.
